abstract: Office of Manhattan Dist Atty Cyrus R Vance Jr states it will not file any rape charges against lawyer Sanford A Rubenstein due to insufficient evidence proving allegation; female executive charged that Rubenstein had sexually assaulted her repeatedly, while he maintains they had consensual sex.
lead_paragraph: After a three-month investigation into rape allegations against Mr. Rubenstein, a prominent lawyer, the Manhattan district attorney’s office said there was insufficient evidence to press charges.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr

snippet: After a three-month investigation into rape allegations against Mr. Rubenstein, a prominent lawyer, the Manhattan district attorney’s office said there was insufficient evidence to press charges.

headline.main: Sanford Rubenstein Will Not Face Rape Charges
headline.print_headline: A High-Profile New York Lawyer Won’t Face Rape Charges
